title: nf-core/phaseimpute pipeline - params.posfile schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.posfile

panel.errorMessage: Panel name must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

chr.errorMessage: Chromosome name must be provided as a string and cannot contain spaces

vcf.errorMessage: VCF with sites per chromosome must be provided. Must have .vcf.gz extension

txt.errorMessage: TXT with sites (position file) per chromosome must be provided. Must have .txt or .tsv extension with optional .gz
